item.title: Omfg help me plz!
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

Austin, why use a complicated compiler (here’s a simple one)

@echo off title Stant Compiler javac *.java pause

Now go find how to set your Enviromental Variables correctly in the tutorial section and download the latest Java which I believe is 13 atm. Then just use the one I provided you, if not and continue to use the one that you found just change the 07 to 13.

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg help me plz!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Spyder Owner Spyder
item.description:
@Owner_Spyder wrote:

Go to your program files, and then go to java, and look for jdk jdk1.sumthing.0_06, go to your compile and then change the 7 to a 6 or 5 or 13, which ever you have.

item.title: Omfg help me plz!
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

ok i found a working compuler i think

@echo off
COLOR 04
title medionscape compiler
echo -------------------------
echo Files Being Compiled…
echo -------------------------
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
cls
COLOR 02
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo Files Compiled
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
pause

yes i finally foudn one that works but…it says cannot find class specified…what do i do? and taharok i no its in thw wrong section but im new to mopar can u please help me out this one time? it was so hard for me to get a working compiler please help!

Read full topic
